Transcript: This is National Post calling to let you know that your newspaper subscription has expired. Tomorrow, you will receive your last copy of the newspaper. To renew your subscription and ensure uninterrupted home delivery of the National Post, please call one eight seven seven five zero three post. That's one eight seven seven five zero three seven six seven eight. Our customer service center is open Monday to Friday, six AM to eight PM, and Saturday, six AM to three PM. If you have made a payment for your newspaper in the last day or so, thank you. Please continue to enjoy home delivery of National Post. Have a nice day.
